item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>the weather here is very nice, 70 degrees at the moment and predicted mid 70s tomorrow. it is a genuine shame about the weather there, of course i don't think i'll be getting snow in la or new zealand next week!</p>
item.content:encoded: the weather here is very nice, 70 degrees at the moment and predicted mid 70s tomorrow. it is a genuine shame about the weather there, of course i don’t think i’ll be getting snow in la or new zealand next week!

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>I don't even understand the words!! Has the weather improved? They are forecasting heavy snow here in E England tonight/tomorrow!!</p>
item.content:encoded: I don’t even understand the words!! Has the weather improved? They are forecasting heavy snow here in E England tonight/tomorrow!!
